attributes.action: Do not postpone the local elections
attributes.additional_details: We also think that postponing the local elections is undemocratic.
attributes.background: Local elections are held so that local people can have a say on local issues. We think that the postponement of some of the local elections would prevent citizens from voicing their opinions on local issues.
